title: Latest Adverse News on J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC
reasoning: J.P. Morgan Securities PLC is currently facing significant legal and regulatory challenges, including multiple fines and settlements totaling over $151 million related to various misconducts, including misleading disclosures and breach of fiduciary duties.
news:
1. [J.P. Morgan Fined $3M for Misreporting 77 Billion Shares - Yahoo Finance](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/j-p-morgan-fined-3m-110917606.html) - FINRA slaps J.P. Morgan with a $3M fine over short interest errors.
2. [J.P. Morgan to Pay $150M to Settle Slew of SEC Charges - Wealth Management](https://www.wealthmanagement.com/regulation-compliance/j-p-morgan-to-pay-150m-to-settle-slew-of-sec-charges) - J.P. Morgan will pay more than $150 million to settle SEC charges.
3. [SEC.gov | JP Morgan Affiliates to Pay $151 Million to Resolve SEC Charges](https://www.sec.gov/newsroom/press-releases/2024-178) - SEC charged J.P. Morgan Securities LLC for misleading disclosures.
4. [JPMorgan To Pay Investors $151M, SEC Flags 'Law Violations - Benzinga](https://www.benzinga.com/news/large-cap/24/11/41685913/jpmorgan-to-pay-investors-151-million-after-sec-flags-various-law-violations) - Substantial penalty of over $151 million for law violations.
5. [JP Morgan to Pay $151 Million Over Major Disclosure Failures - Stock Law](https://www.stocklaw.com/securities-fraud-blog/2024/december/jp-morgan-to-pay-151-million-over-major-disclosu/) - JP Morgan agreed to pay $151 million to settle SEC charges.
6. [SEC Settles Enforcement Actions with JPMorganChase Affiliates for $151M](https://www.stradley.com/insights/publications/2024/11/sec-settles-with-jp-morgan-affiliates) - SEC settled actions against J.P. Morgan Securities LLC for misleading disclosures.
